name: Tinyverse
description:
The enemy is coming, the only way to save the galaxy is to move all the planets to the teleporters.

Unfortunately, you can't move planets with your bare hands, so you will need the help of nanotechnologies to create link between them.

Well, in fact there isn't any in-game story, I spent too much time hard coding those damn levels, so I hope you have fun with them. :]

Made in 48 hours for LD30.

Controls:

  • Mouse to drag links between planets
  • 1 2 3 to select a link
  • R to restart
  • Escape to go back to the menu
  • M to mute/unmute sounds/music
  • F to change the framerate

Walkthrough: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2-dE6QM3Szc
